name: SkyRocket EdgeStrike
description:
SkyRocket EdgeStrike is a side-view game where you and your friend can compete against each other on one keyboard!

The rules are simple:

  • Person with the most goals at the end of the game wins!
  • One game is 3 minutes long.
  • Boost around, bump your opponent, ricochet the ball against the arena or just wait for your opponent to score an own goal. 

Choose between a variety of vehicles, ranging from a hover car to a FIRE EXTINGUISHER!?

Fast Paced, Vehicular mayhem mixed with a little football: What's not to love?

WARNING! BUGS BEING FIXED
  • Plane selection doesn't work
  • Adjusting volume completely mutes the game
  • Game cannot be paused

This game is still under development, with updates coming soon.

MORE FEAUTURES COMING SOON
  • New Customization options
  • New Game Modes
  • More Music
  • More Arenas
  • More Vehicles
  • More Fun (duh)
Brought To You By Wacky Studios
